data.title: EDITORIAL: Matter of inches
data.meta_description: Only a matter of inches, and this would be a very different day, a very different America. Donald Trump swatted at his ear like a mosquito had bitten him, having turned his head to address a different part of the crowd a second before. History would have changed in that heartbeat, had he moved only a bit differently.
data.text: Only a matter of inches, and this would be a very different day, a very different America. Donald Trump swatted at his ear like a mosquito had bitten him, having turned his head to address a different part of the crowd a second before.
